channel.title: Tricky problem
channel.description:
Ok im gonna try to make this a "tricky problem"
I have been trying to search moparscape for sources and I cannot search it for some reason just says error. When I click on server downloads it says error internet connection. So what im trying to ask
If someone could post me a source n client topic that has pk point exchange or atleast a source wth d bolts and d arrows coded in already and working dbow that would be so helpful google sucks so I need it from here. IM NOT BREAKING ANY RULES
EDIT: RL BLOWZ SOURCES ON THAT SUCKS THATS WHY I NEED ONE FROM HERE

item.title: Tricky problem
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Add the models and learn to program them into your server. We don’t allow direct download requests here.

Read full topic

item.title: Tricky problem
item.dc:creator: @b4k_2_lumby b4k 2 lumby
item.description:
@b4k_2_lumby wrote:

oo
Well i gotta look for a tut im jsut getting into coding now and I suck at client sided stuff =( Also how do I add like the right bonuses for becuz its not in item.cfg its all 0s i dont know where to change the hit bonus and stuff =( Imma look for a tut or a source so yeah just lock this

Read full topic

item.title: Tricky problem
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

No. Make the ids for dragon arrows and bolts high numbers. For example, 13000 and 13500.

Read full topic

item.title: Tricky problem
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

b4k 2 lumby:

I hate 525 thats why if not id be long gone by now lol trust me maroc since u relased ur source i tried to add d bolts and arrows and I failed lol I know theres one out there ive gone through 35 pages of server downloads =(

Bro just download edgeville pkz because i know they have d bolts and effects and d bow and d arrows and if not d arrows just try ice arrows or rune arrows because they are probably as good. And if you dont like pking sources then just take out the pvp. Just edit it to your liking. please no more topics like this

Read full topic

lso Ive tried to ask how to add the models fo d arrows and d bolts without taking away rune bolts or rune arrows.

Just change the ids of the bolts and arrows to be different than rune’s.
